trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress" /> control in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: 为可视化设计器中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress" /> 控件提供设计时支持。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类文档。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressDesigner" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelDesigner>类时创建关联<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控件或该控件的设计图面上的副本。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains control designer regions for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含关联控件的控件设计器区域的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the HTML markup to display the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress" /> control and populates the collection with the current control designer regions.
trans-unit.target: 返回 HTML 标记以显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress" /> 控件并使用当前控件设计器区域填充集合。

trans-unit.source: The design-time HTML markup for the associated control, which includes all control designer regions.
trans-unit.target: 关联控件（包括所有控件设计器区域）的设计时 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> object to fetch content for.
trans-unit.target: 要获取其内容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the content for an editable region of the design-time view of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress" /> 控件的设计时视图中可编辑区域的内容。

trans-unit.source: A serialized copy of the template that is used to render the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 用于在设计时呈现关联 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel" /> 控件的模板的序列化副本。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides the name of the region to update.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它提供要更新的区域的名称。

trans-unit.source: A serialized template for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 关联控件的序列化模板。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the content for the editable region of the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 指定控件的可编辑区域在设计时的内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer should use a temporary copy instead of the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器是否应使用临时副本取代与设计器关联的实际控件来生成设计时标记。
